QuestData.Title: Clear the Way
QuestData.Description: Are you seeing this? Virmen, hozen, and water sprites... all pouring out of the brewery doors and windows! What the heck is going on in there!?$b$bThere is another entrance, on the eastern side of the brewery. I'm going to run over there and try to figure out what's going on. In the meantime, see if you can't get rid of these creatures. There's nothing worse than a drunken hozen.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 Ale-Addled Hozen or Mischievous Virmen.
QuestData.CompletionText: This brewery - it's a disgrace to the Stormstout name! Something needs to be done!
QuestData.RewardText: I've had just about enough of this brewery. I'm starting to think that you and I should just bust down the wall and clean house.

Objectives.Objective: Ale-Addled Hozen or Mischievous Virmen slain
